nodes.text: The E-11 blaster pistol was a type of weapon used in the days of the Old Republic. The Human Zeerid Korr sometimes wore an E-11 blaster pistol in a single-sling holster under his jacket, and carried the blaster in place of a pair of GH-44 blasters.
The E-11 blaster pistol appeared in Paul S. Kemp's novel The Old Republic: Deceived, which was published in 2011.
